title: Anvil
description: A Rust-based package manager for VFX/Animation pipelines. Think Rez, but faster. YAML-based package definitions, automatic dependency resolution, and DCC launcher for Maya, Houdini, Blender, Nuke with correct environment setup.

title: OpenGrid
description: Modern production tracking for VFX/Animation â€” a lightweight alternative to ShotGrid. Python SDK for working with production data, FastAPI REST API, and React dashboard. Track assets, shots, tasks, and versions.

title: USD Asset Resolver
description: Production-ready USD AR2 resolver with Rust-powered performance. Smart URI parsing, LRU caching with mtime invalidation, SQLite backend, automatic version resolution, and PySide6 visual asset browser.

title: USD Lint
description: A fast, configurable linter for OpenUSD .usda files. Rust-native PEG parser, 10 built-in rules for naming, hierarchy, composition arcs, and property validation. Colored terminal output, JSON, and GitHub Actions formats. Single static binary, zero runtime dependencies.

title: Rosewood UI
description: A warm, cozy design system with CSS components, React wrappers, and PySide6/Qt components for DCC tool GUIs. Dark-first design that works across web apps and desktop pipeline tools.
